alert.note: Alert for Big Island South; Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Kohala; Kona; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 23 at 3:49PM HST until January 24 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY UNTIL 6 PM HST TUESDAY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI...NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI...AND WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... .A northwest (320 degrees) swell will gradually subside tonight and fall below advisory thresholds Tuesday evening. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST TUESDAY... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 18 to 24 ft for north facing shores subsiding to 10 to 15 ft. Large breaking waves 14 to 18 ft for west facing shores subsiding to 8 to 12 ft, expect 7 to 10 ft Big Island. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, north facing shores of Maui, and west facing shores of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
